references.paper_title: Domain-agnostic tuning-encoder for fast personalization of text-to-image models
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for fast personalization of text-to-image models, a key aspect of the Edify Image model's capabilities.

references.paper_title: ediff-i: Text-to-image diffusion models with an ensemble of expert denoisers
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel method for training text-to-image diffusion models, which directly relates to the core methodology of Edify Image.

references.paper_title: Improving image generation with better captions
references.reason: This paper focuses on improving the quality of image generation using better captions, a feature directly relevant to Edify Image's text-to-image capabilities.
This foundational paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models which are foundational to Edify Image's underlying architecture.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with CLIP latents
references.reason: This paper introduces a hierarchical approach to text-conditional image generation which is similar to the approach used in Edify Image.
